module: Module-level comment: The DE1_SoC_QSYS_pll_sys module generates five distinct clocks from a single reference input (`refclk`) using the `altera_pll` instantiation. It accepts a reset signal (`rst`) for reinitialization and outputs synchronized clocks (`outclk_0` to `outclk_4`) and a `locked` status indicating PLL synchronization. Configurable parameters in `altera_pll` define frequencies, phases, and duty cycles.
